title: As a BOC User I want to create a new Request
custom_steps:
Wireframe: 
https://gox298.axshare.com/#p=requests_-_boc
https://gox298.axshare.com/#p=create_a_request

Acceptance Criteria: 
* On the "Requests" widget BOC Users see a "Create New" button.
* Clicking "Create New" will open a pop up where the user can select an ebis player to create a new Request for. 
* The dropdown of players should be all current MLB Players (currently affiliated with an Org - do not include Released or FA players). 
* Selecting a player will populate the POS, MLB Org and DOB fields on the pop up. 
* The BOC user should be able to select which Winter League Club to create the request for. 
* The "Submit to BOC" button should be available after a player and Winter League Club have been selected.
* Clicking "Add Row" should add an additional row to the Request form for the user to be able to submit multiple requests for the same Club at once. 
* If more than one row exists, there is a trash can icon associated with each row. 
* Clicking the trash can icon will remove the relevant row.
* Clicking "Submit to BOC" should submit the request to the BOC and throw a blue success notification per the wireframe.
* The Request should appear in the Winter League Clubs' list of Requests, as well as the BOC's List of requests as "Pending".

title: As a BOC user I want to see a list of the current season's Requests
custom_steps:
Wireframe: 
https://gox298.axshare.com/#p=requests_-_boc

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Winter+League+Requests+-+Data+Discovery

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Within the "Winter Leagues" dashboard there is a "Requests" tab. 
* Clicking on the "Requests" tab will load the Requests widget per the provided Data Discovery.
* The Requests will be sorted in reverse chronological order based on Request Date.  
*Filters and action buttons are covered in follow up stories*

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to filter the Winter League Requests
custom_steps:
Wireframe: 
https://gox298.axshare.com/#p=requests_-_boc

Acceptance Criteria: 
* The "Requests" page has filters to enable the user to filter by Season or Status.
* The "season" filter defaults to the current season. Only prior years are available. Changing the dropdown will refresh the widget to display the selected years' requests. 
* The second filter is a status filter. 
* The available statuses are : 
  - All 
  - Pending
  - Submitted
  - In Negotiation
  - Contracted
  - Denied
  - Cancelled
  - Expired
* The default is "All", but clicking one of the other statuses should reload the page to display only the requests that have the selected status.

title: As a Winter League User I want to see a list of my Club's Requests for the current season in Spanish
custom_steps:
Wireframe: 
https://gox298.axshare.com/#p=requests_-_wl_coach

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Winter+League+Requests+-+Data+Discovery
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Necessary+Spanish+Translations

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Within the Winter League Club's site, when viewing the site in Spanish there is a "Solicitudes" tab. 
* Clicking on the "Solicitudes" tab will load the Requests widget per the provided Data Discovery (Spanish translations provided) and wireframe. 
* The Requests will be sorted in reverse chronological order based on Request Date. 
* By default only Requests Created by the logged in Club are displayed. 
* All filters work as detailed in the English story.

title: As a BOC user I want the Reserve List widget to be populated with the correct Clubs
custom_steps:
Wireframe: 
https://gox298.axshare.com/#p=reserve_list_widget_-_boc

Batch Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Reserve+List+Population+Batch

Acceptance Criteria: 
* "Reserve List Population" is a batch option under the "General" section on the batch screen.
* Clicking "Reserve List Population" opens the batch in the batch screen. 
* The batch parameters display per the batch requirements. 
* A "Run" button is available. 
* Clicking "Run" will run the batch according to the selected parameters and the provided rules. 
* Any Reserve List created or updated as a result of this batch running should display in the "Batch Results" widget. Available columns should be League, Club, Reserve List Created, Reserve List Archived. 
* Batch run information should display in the batch history widget. 
* A system date value will need to be added for the Winter League Portal Rollover date.

title: As a BOC user I want to add a player to a Reserve List
custom_steps:
Wireframe: 
https://gox298.axshare.com/#p=reserve_list_-_boc
https://gox298.axshare.com/#p=reserve_list_-_wl_coach

Acceptance Criteria: 
* While in edit mode, BOC users see a section at the top of the form that allows them to enter new players.
* Populating any value in the two required fields (First and Last) will enable the Search button. 
* Clicking Search will run a search for players that meet the entered criteria. 
  - The population of the search is ANY ebis player, regardless of status or age, and also any player that was previously entered in the Winter League Portal that was not tied to an ebis profile. 
* The system will return a list of players that meet the entered criteria, per the wireframe. 
* Checking off a player profile will enable the "Add" buttons available and the user will have the ability to add the selected player to the Import, Primary or Secondary lists this way. 
* The user will also have the ability to drag and drop a player into the desired list. 
* The addition of the player is not kept until the form as a whole is Saved. 
* Clicking "Save" should store the changes made. 

*Adding unlisted players is a follow up story*

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to edit a Reserve List
custom_steps:
Wireframe: 
https://gox298.axshare.com/#p=reserve_list_-_boc

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Reserve+List+-+Data+Discovery

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When viewing a Reserve List, the BOC sees an "Edit" button. 
* Clicking "Edit" will reload the Reserve List in edit mode per the wireframe. 
* In edit mode, the user will have the ability to remove players from the Reserve Lists by using the trash can. 
* In edit mode, the user will have the ability to edit the comments associated with a player by clicking on the comments bubble icon. 
* In edit mode, there will be a "Cancel" button and a "Save" button. 
* Clicking "Cancel" will prompt the user to confirm that they wish to lose their changes. If they confirm, the screen is refreshed in View mode and none of their changes are kept (including changes made to comments). 
* Clicking "Save" will store all of the changes made to the screen, and any associated comments and a blue successful save notification will be thrown.(Rule checks completed in later stories)

title: As a Winter League Club user I want to add a player to a Reserve List in Spanish
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://gox298.axshare.com/#p=reserve_list_-_wl_coach

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Reserve+List+-+Data+Discovery

Acceptance Criteria: 
* While in edit mode when viewing the form in Spanish, Winter League Club users see a section at the top of the form that allows them to enter new players.
* Populating any value in the two required fields (First and Last) will enable the Search (Buscar) button. 
* Clicking Search will run a search for players that meet the entered criteria. 
  - The population of the search is ANY ebis player, regardless of status or age, and also any player that was previously entered in the Winter League Portal that was not tied to an ebis profile. 
* The system will return a list of players that meet the entered criteria, per the wireframe. 
* Checking off a player profile will enable the "Add" buttons (Agregar a Importados, Agregar a Primaria, Agregar a Secundaria) available and the user will have the ability to add the selected player to the Import, Primary or Secondary lists this way. 
* The user can also drag and drop the player from the search into the desired list. 
* The addition of the player is not kept until the form as a whole is Saved. 
* Clicking "Save" should store the changes made. 

*Adding unlisted players is a follow up story*

title: As a Major League Club user I want to be able to view a Reserve List
custom_steps:
Wireframe: 
https://gox298.axshare.com/#p=reserve_list_-_boc

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Clicking on a Reserve List as a Major League Club user loads the Reserve List per the provided wireframe EXCEPT they do not see the Comments.
* MLB Club users are only able to view/open Reserve Lists that have been Released to All Clubs.

title: As a Winter League Club user I want to be able to choose whether to view the homepage in English or Spanish
custom_steps:
Wireframe: 
https://gox298.axshare.com/#p=requests_-_wl_coach

Acceptance Criteria: 
* After logging into the system, there is an "English" and an "EspaÃ±ol" hyperlink at the top of the page, see wireframe for location. 
* The language currently being used is greyed out and not clickable.
* When viewing the site in English, clicking on "EspaÃ±ol" will reload the page in Spanish. The system will need to maintain this selection as the user navigates from tab to tab and form to form. 
* When viewing the site in Spanish, clicking on "English" will reload the page in English. The system will need to maintain this selection as the user navigates from tab to tab and form to form. 

Tab names in Spanish: 
 - Comunicaciá½¹n del Club (Club Communication)
 - Lista PIEF (PIEF List)
 - Lista de Reserva (Reserve List)
 - Solicitudes (Requests)

title: As a Winter League Club user I want to be able to Sign Out of the system
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://gox298.axshare.com/#p=requests_-_wl_coach

Acceptance Criteria: 
* There is a "Sign Out" link at the top right corner of the page per the wireframe. 
* If viewing the page in Spanish this says "Finalizar Sesiá½¹n", in English it says "Sign Out". 
* Clicking "Sign Out" or "Finalizar Sesiá½¹n"  will log the user out of the winter league portal, and take them back to the login page.

title: As a Winter League Club user I want to be able to sign in to the Winter League Portal
custom_steps:
Mockups: 
When this story gets assigned please reach out for full access to the Zeplin project

Login https://scene.zeplin.io/project/5a5e3ea40bc236e05ff04e50/screen/5a5e3eccb14a7a27589af18b

UI
https://scene.zeplin.io/project/5a5e3ea40bc236e05ff04e50/screen/5a60f33658a7e256c82b7b4a

Mobile UI
https://scene.zeplin.io/project/5a5e3ea40bc236e05ff04e50/screen/5a621cd23ffff38ed26de121
https://scene.zeplin.io/project/5a5e3ea40bc236e05ff04e50/screen/5a621cd1f7420f59255872d1

The only new styling that needs to be done within the UI is the new top nav and the club header (Toros del Este in the mockup).  All other styling should be pulled in from ebis global styles (forms, widgets, notifications, modals, etc.)

Acceptance Criteria: 
* A user is able to enter a valid username and password on the Winter League Portal site and click "Login". 
* The system will verify the user's credentials, and assuming they are valid, will log the user into the site and take them to the homepage. 
* This story will need to include the UI as well as whatever setup is needed to establish username/passwords that allow entry to the WLP site.

title: As a Winter League Club user I want the system to be able to tell which Club I am affiliated with
custom_steps:
Wireframe: 
https://gox298.axshare.com/#p=club_comm_widget_-_wl_coach

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Winter League Club users can be assigned a role (probably an LDAP but up to dev to determine best solution) to signify which Winter League Club they belong to. 
* These LDAPs will need to correspond with the Affiliates added so need to be able to somehow be added outside of builds. (We can't require a new build to add a Club.)
* When a Winter League Club user logs in to the system, they will see their Club logo that indicates which Club the system has identified them with (from the affiliate profile). 
* If the user is not affiliated with a specific Club (they are unassigned), they are able to login and do not see a logo.

title: As a Winter League Club I want to be able to view the PIEF List in Spanish
custom_steps:
Wireframe: 
https://gox298.axshare.com/#p=pief_list_-_wl_coach

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/PIEF+List+-+WPL+-+Data+Discovery

Acceptance Criteria:
* When viewing the Winter League Portal in Spanish, there is a Lista PIEF tab available per the wireframe. 
* Clicking on the PIEF List tab will load the PIEF List in Spanish, per the data discovery and wireframe. 
* Loading the tab will load the current season's PIEF Lists by default. 
* The user will have the ability to view prior years by changing the "season" filter. 
* Only "Approved" players appear in the list. 
* The content within the PIEF List is NOT translated - only the column headers and the widget title

title: As a Winter League user I want to see an are you sure message when Canceling a request (English)
custom_steps:
Messages: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Winter+League+Portal+-+Messages

Acceptance Criteria:
* When clicking 'Cancel' on the Requests page the user is prompted to confirm that they wish to cancel the player's request. See Messages #13.
* If the user confirms, the request is cancelled. 
* If the user does not confirm, no action is taken.

title: As a Winter League Club I do not want to see Club Communication until it is developed
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* The Club Communication tab of the WLP site is removed for the time being.
* The default landing page for now should be Reserve List.

title: As a user I want to be directed to the proper Portal link if I click the Sign Up link on the WLP login page
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria:
* Clicking "Sign Up" on the winterleagues login page should open a new tab/window for the user that navigates them to 
https://clubhouse.mlb.com/UserRegistrationForm/?GROUP=WinterLeagues

title: As a user I want to be directed to the proper Portal link if I click the Forgot Password link on the WLP login page
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria:
* Clicking "Forgot Password" on the winterleagues login page should open a new tab/window for the user that navigates them to 
https://clubhouse.mlb.com/UserRegistrationPassword/

title: As a user I want to see an error message if I enter invalid credentials on the WLP login page
custom_steps:
Messages: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Winter+League+Portal+-+Messages

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Entering invalid credentials (an invalid username or password) and clicking Log In should trigger an error message. See Messages #14.

title: As a Winter League user I want to be able to see the Reserve List and Requests even if I am not affiliated with a Club
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* If a user logs into the Winter League Portal site that appears in the WLP Users page as "Unassigned" but has Viewer access to Reserve Lists and Requests, they should be able to load those pages.
* The Requests can just default to the first Club in the list. 
* The Reserve List widget view should default to all Leagues/Clubs for the current year.

title: As a Winter League Club I only want to be able to view the PIEF List if it has been Sent to Clubs (Send Lists to BOC action)
custom_steps:
Wireframe: 
https://gox298.axshare.com/#p=pief_list_-_wl_coach

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/PIEF+List+-+WPL+-+Data+Discovery

Acceptance Criteria:
* Winter League Club users will only be able to view the PIEF Lists that have been finalized and officially published. This should be driven by the "Send Lists to BOC" action.  
* Once that has been done for the PIEF Lists, the year should be available for the WL Clubs as detailed in story #154103634 and #155455405. 
* Prior to the list being sent to BOC, it should not be available. All prior years should be available.

title: As a user I want to be able to run the Winter League Performance Report
custom_steps:
Report Layout: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Performance+Report+-+Report+Layout

Report Details: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Performance+Report+-+Report+Details

Report Logic: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Performance+Report+-+Population%2C+Logic+and+Sort+Considerations

Report Prompts: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Performance+Report+-+Prompts

Audience/Security: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Performance+Report+-+Audience+-+Security+-+Frequency

View Story: #157500263

Acceptance Criteria: 
* "Winter League Performance Report" is a report in the Report listing widget. Selecting this report from the widget will launch the prompts according to the requirements. 
* The category of this report should be "Pro Player Management". 
* Entering the desired prompts and running the report will work and match the requirements. 
* The report will have an LDAP associated with it. Please provide the LDAP when the story is delivered and a user id to test the report and security with. 
* Please note the details around formatting provided at the top of the Report Details document, and the fact that the prompts allowed will vary based on the user type. 

*For QA* - This report needs to be compared with the current winter league portal version of the report. We are not building out all of the prompts at this time so we will need to discuss the best way to test/compare. We are only testing this for MLB Club/BOC users for this release.
